title: #18: BONUS EPISODE! More Listener Questions about The People vs O. J. Simpson and more
description:
Jim Clemente, former FBI profiler and writer/producer for Criminal Minds, and Lisa Zambetti, casting director for Criminal Minds, answer more listener questions about the jury process, race and abuse in connection to the series "The People vs. O.J. Simpson."

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
